---
name: "Feature Request"
about: "Suggest a new feature or improvement for the modpack"
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: "enhancement"
assignees: ""
---

## Problem

Describe the current issue or limitation in the modpack.

## Proposed Solution

Explain how you think the problem should be solved. Provide detailed suggestions where possible.

## Additional Context

Add any supporting information or examples, such as screenshots or relevant mod features, that could provide more context.
